div.head: 傷寒陰盛隔陽
div.div: harm caused by cold whereby abundant yin forms a barrier to yang

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Shang han yin sheng ge yang

entry.def: harm caused by cold whereby abundant yin forms a barrier to yang

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a type of shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, whereby internally abundant yin cold forms a barrier to yang in the exterior, resulting in a cold body with restlessness, and a fine and tight movement in the vessels as its characteristics. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 21: 治傷寒陰盛隔陽，身冷煩躁，脈細沉緊，黑龍散方 , “To cure harm caused by cold , whereby abundant yin forms a barrier to yang , resulting in a cold body with restlessness, and a fine and tight movement in the vessels, [apply] the recipe for ‘black dragon powder ’”.
